SuiteSection.title: What's included in Internxt's Black Friday deal
SuiteSection.subtitle: Internxt has a whole suite of private cloud services designed to help you and your family stay safe online.

drive.title: Internxt Drive
drive.subtitle: Back up your treasured family recipes with our safe and secure cloud storage service, Internxt Drive.

photos.title: Internxt Photos
photos.subtitle: Save all of your family photos this holiday season with a cloud-based gallery, Internxt Photos.

send.title: Internxt Send
send.subtitle: Share your travel itineraries and tickets with our encrypted file-transfer service, Internxt Send.

FeatureSection.title: Why choose Internxt?
FeatureSection.subtitle: Privacy made for everyone and simple-to-use online security that you don’t have to be  an expert to understand. Powerful but familiar, Internxt is encrypted cloud storage built for everyday use in all walks of life.

feature1.title: Private by default
feature1.subtitle1: No first or third-party access to your file ever! You have total control of your data.

feature2.title: Fast sync
feature2.subtitle1: Encrypt, scramble, fragment, distribute, and transfer, all in the blink of an eye.

feature3.title: Secure from the core
feature3.subtitle1: Built on blockchain, end-to-end encrypted, and decentralized across a vast peer-to-peer network.

feature4.title: Safe sharing
feature4.subtitle1: Send encrypted files and photos back and forth to your favorite people via link and email.

feature5.title: Multiplatform
feature5.subtitle1: Privacy for all devices, browsers, and operating systems! Linux, Windows, macOS, iOS, Android.

feature6.title: Zero-knowledge
feature6.subtitle1: You are the only one with access to your data. Not even internxt can view your files!

TestimonialSection.title: What our users are saying about Internxt

cristian.text: "We needed a Dropbox alternative that allowed us to store client files and work (social media files) and, as Internxt is GDPR friendly, fit perfectly for us!"

josep.text: "I've been using Google Drive for several years, but I needed an alternative that granted me the privacy of my data. Something that Google or other well-known platforms can't do. That's why I moved to Internxt."

eva.text: "Internxt is a convenient cloud storage service for budget-conscious clients. It has a streamlined interface and a reliable support team, which makes it a great option for those who need to store their files securely."

faq.question: How can I get the Black Friday discount?
answer: To take advantage of our Black Friday discount, you must click one of the “Get the deal” buttons located on this page, and you will be redirected directly to checkout with the discount already applied to your new 2TB Internxt plan.

faq.question: When does the promotion end?
answer: Our Black Friday Sale runs from November 21st until December 5th, 2022.

faq.question: Who is eligible for this discount?
answer: New users or anyone with an Internxt free, 20GB, or 200GB subscription plan is eligible to take part in our Black Friday Sale.

faq.question: Will I keep the discount when my plan ends?
answer: The discount is applied for the first full year of service. Therefore, you will have access to our 2TB subscription plan at this discounted price for only one year.
If you choose to continue your existing subscription using the deal, your account will be charged at the standard 2TB plan price for the following year.

faq.question: How much will it cost to renew the plan after the first year?
answer: The 2TB plan costs €9.99/month paid monthly or €8.99/month when paid annually. You can check out all [our pricing and subscription plans](https://internxt.com/pricing) on the Internxt website.

faq.question: What payment methods does Internxt accept?
answer: We currently accept payments via credit and debit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc.). You may also pay via Apple and Google Pay, Cartes Banaires, Alipay, Wechat Pay, Bancontact, EPS, GiroPay, iDEAL, Przelewy24, Sofort, Blik, Klarna, Afterpay, SEPA Direct Debit.

faq.question: Do you offer any discounts for nonprofits or students?
answer: Yes, you can get 50% off any Internxt subscription plan if you are a member of a nonprofit organization or NGO. Contact us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) with your organization's credentials so that we can verify your eligibility and apply for your discount.

You can also get a 50% discount if you are a student. Request the discount and verify your eligibility by emailing us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) from your university email address.

faq.question: Have more questions?
answer: If you have more questions, feel free to reach out to us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) or say hello on social media. We are always delighted to hear from you!

FooterSection.title: Stand with privacy. Choose Internxt!
